question: [Study] Italiano: Calcola area e perimetro del triangolo con vertici (153, 150), (192, 116), (167, 116).

qas.question: [Study] Italiano: Calcola area e perimetro del triangolo con vertici (153, 150), (192, 116), (167, 116).
[Practice] Espanol: Calcula el area y el perimetro del triangulo con vertices (153, 150), (192, 116), (167, 116). Provide only the area.
[Review] Svenska: Berakna arean och omkretsen for triangeln med (153, 150), (192, 116), (167, 116). Provide only the perimeter.
